{{Description|You and [[Paimon]] studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.}}
'''Gust Surge''' is [[Traveler (Anemo)]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Tornado DMG and Additional Elemental DMG can strike up to '''9''' times: once every 0.5 seconds from 2 to 6 seconds after activating Gust Surge.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Tornado DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|icd|Additional Elemental DMG}}
* Unlike other Talents with Elemental Absorption, Anemo Traveler's absorption priority is {{Cryo}} / {{Color|Cryo|Frozen}} > {{Pyro}} > {{Hydro}} > {{Electro}}.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Sweeping Gust}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Intertwined Winds}}
